DOC.detailed_description: Subjects meet eligibility criterion undergo physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , spirometry , muscular strength test , functional muscle test , 6-minute walk test ( 6MWT ) ( appropriate ) , laboratory test , MRI muscle ( needle ) biopsy . Quality life assess via SF-36 questionnaire . Functional ability level handicap assess Rotterdam handicap scale .
